alert.note: Alert for Southwest Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 1:49PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Beaver and north central Iron Counties through 215 PM MDT... At 149 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 32 miles east of Ranch Campground, or 35 miles northeast of Ursine, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Beaver and north central Iron Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
